value.value: This is an initialization script that runs when the workflow is started

logic.comment:
The global variable isWfConversionToolEnabled controls whether the "create new" or "select existing" radio button is editable on the workflow template page.
It is recommended to not change this interaction, but to change the solution config property "WorkflowTemplate.conversionTool.enabled" instead.

logic.commentStep: Get a list of the workflow-enabled objects and filter based on the current user's object capabilities
Filter the list of workflow-enabled objects by the objects that are enabled on the system
Convert the final list of options to a value/label array
Check if an object type has already been selected
Get the default object type from configuration properties
Get the values from your filtered list of object options and check if the list contains the default object type
If the list does contain the default value, set the objectType field with that value
Check if objectType is not empty. If so, set the label and value for the selected objectType.
Push the selected object choice into the array of options
Sort the options by localized label
Filter optionType options based on the sorted list
Filter available workflow definitions based on objectType
